General.Name: EJF Investments Ltd
General.Description: EJF Investments Limited is a principal investment firm. The firm seeks to invest in financial services sector with a focus in structured debt and equity, loans, bonds, preference shares, convertible notes and private equity. It considers investments domiciled in the United States, the United Kingdom and Europe. EJF Investments Limited was founded in 2016 and is based in Jersey, Channel Island.
General.Address: IFC1, Esplanade, Saint Helier, Jersey, JE1 4BP
